text:
Nano Banana is wild. I uploaded an empty room & it came back fully furnished with real IKEA products: 

✦ Go to Gemini. 
✦ Click “Tools” and then “create images.” 
✦ Make sure it's on "Thinking" (bottom left).
✦ Copy-paste my prompt below:

"Here's a picture of my empty living room. Show me how it would look furnished, and add IKEA product name next to each piece of furniture."

Bonus trick to remove the "made by AI".

↳ I share the trick here: https://lnkd.in/dZ96-CFS.
 
More prompts to copy-paste in my newsletter (how-to-ai.guide). Join 173,000+ weekly readers.
